channel.title: Sending messages immediately at start of day
channel.description:
So I'm sure most of you know that you can type a message before the night phase ends, and then spam enter as the day starts to send it very quickly.
I was just Reaper and someone debauched me and I attacked them (they immune), so they knew I was a killer. There is no way I can chill them faster than they can send a message saying I attacked them.
I think the chat box should be disabled any time you aren't able to send messages.

item.title: Sending messages immediately at start of day
item.dc:creator: Aquillion
item.description:
Disabling the chat box would be extremely irritating and would generally make the interface clunkier.

If you want to have a chance to chill people, then the suggestion you should be making is for day ability interfaces to be enabled a few seconds before the ability to send messages goes online at the start of a new day.

Read full topic

item.title: Sending messages immediately at start of day
item.dc:creator: danny135
item.description:
Edited main post with suggestion.

I think the chat box should be disabled any time you aren’t able to send messages.

There’s no reason to be able to type unless you can actually send the message.

This lets reaper have time to chill and makes things slightly more interesting by preventing instant accusations at the start of the day.

Thinking about it, people could still copy/paste messages instantly.
